meanings.definition: An ancient Hindu text or scripture.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother reads a purana every evening to learn about our culture.
meanings.sent2: The purana contains stories of gods and goddesses from long ago.
meanings.sent3: I fell asleep during the purana, dreaming of ancient times.
meanings.sent4: The purana is a treasure trove of wisdom passed down through generations.
meanings.sent5: The words in the purana painted a vivid picture of the past.

meanings.definition: A genre of Hindu religious texts containing myths and legends.
meanings.sent1: The purana is filled with fascinating tales of gods and heroes.
meanings.sent2: Scholars study the purana to understand the religious beliefs of ancient India.
meanings.sent3: The children were captivated by the purana, imagining themselves as characters in the stories.
meanings.sent4: The purana weaves together myths and legends into a rich tapestry of culture.
meanings.sent5: Listening to the purana felt like stepping into a magical world of wonder.

meanings.sent1: Grandpa loves to tell us a purana before bedtime.
meanings.sent2: The villagers gathered around the fire to hear the purana of the brave warrior.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they heard the purana of the mischievous monkey.
meanings.sent4: The purana of the lost city has been passed down for generations.
meanings.sent5: The purana of the wise sage left a lasting impression on the listeners.
